name: Level Shock
overview: A very different take on a Frogger\Freeway style game often called a single screen platformer, which makes sense because you can use each level as a platform and there are platform like sections to stand on. However the goal is to avoid being hit by the platforms and get to the very top of the screen. Once you choose your path you can only change your location by settling on a platform before proceeding upwards again from wherever the moving platforms take you. ARetroSytaxEra described it in verse, "Get on a block, into the groove, this is a crock, in mid-air you can't move." Published in Commodore 64 Club #02 [Italian Release].
